component.text: Fixed Length Subnet Mask
VLSM
1,000 Hosts
8,000 Hosts
100 Hosts
400 Hosts
Classful subnetting requires all subnets to have the same subnet mask. If three bits from the host portion of the address are used, it creates eight equal subnets of 8,190 hosts.
Subnet #1 has 8,000 hosts

Classful subnetting requires all subnets to have the same subnet mask. If three bits from the host portion of the address are used, it creates eight equal subnets of 8,190 hosts.

Classless CIDR Addressing allows for the creation of unequal size subnets. Subnets can be created based on the number of host addresses required. Care must be taken not to overlap the subnet address ranges.

Subnet #1 has 8,000 hosts
Using three bits from the host portion of the network enables the creation of a single subnet with 8,190 host addresses.

Classless Addressing allows for the creation of unequal size subnets. Subnets can be created based on the number of host addresses required. Care must be taken not to overlap the subnet address ranges.
